name: Intersection (itch) (HuskiGames)
description:
Made In 3 Hours for the Trijam #159 for the theme:  Control more than one

Controls: click on the car to make them stop

If the line of cars gets to long thay will push the car infrount of it.

Sweet by LiQWYD | https://soundcloud.com/liqwyd/
